data.name: SunLocation_ValidationError_LatitudeRange
data.value: Latitude must be between -90 and 90 degrees
data.comment: Validation error for invalid latitude in sun calculations

data.value: Longitude must be between -180 and 180 degrees
data.comment: Validation error for invalid longitude in sun calculations

data.comment: Validation error for missing date in sun calculations

data.comment: Validation error for missing datetime in sun calculations

data.value: Date must be a valid date within reasonable range

data.comment: Validation error for invalid datetime range in sun calculations

data.name: SunLocation_ValidationError_ObjectHeight
data.value: Object height must be greater than 0
data.comment: Validation error for invalid object height in shadow calculations

data.value: Object height must be less than or equal to 1000 meters
data.comment: Validation error for object height too large in shadow calculations

data.comment: Validation error for invalid terrain type in shadow calculations

data.name: SunLocation_ValidationError_IntervalMinutes
